values.description: This page describes the pre-built Portfolio Optimizer models in LEAN. If none of these models perform how you want, create a custom Optimizer model.
values.keywords: maximize the portfolio Sharpe Ratio, minimize the portfolio variance and achieve a target return, find the optimal risk-adjusted portfolio that lies on the efficient frontier, equalize the individual risk contribution to the total portfolio risk from each asset
values.og:description: This page describes the pre-built Portfolio Optimizer models in LEAN. If none of these models perform how you want, create a custom Optimizer model.
